materials.raw_text:
Bismuth (Bi):  50 g 
 Mercury (Hg): 20 g 
 Lead (Pb): 5 g 
 Zirconium (Zr): 200 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers. 
 Mercury: Obtain from a licensed chemical supplier with proper safety certifications. 
 Lead: Available from chemical suppliers or hardware stores (ensure safety regulations are followed). 
 Zirconium: Purchase from specialized metal suppliers or chemical vendors.

preparation.raw_text:
